short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Join Bart Simpson in his mischievous adventures with fun visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the rebellious energy of Bart Simpson to your browsing experience with this live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A playful and bold interface inspired by Bart’s mischievous spirit and iconic style.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that captures the fun and chaos of Bart Simpson’s world.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into Bart Simpson-inspired games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Add features that amp up your browsing experience with the energy and wit of Bart Simpson.
